headline: Mondelēz International Continues Progress Against  “Snacking Made Right” Priorities
summary: Showcases continued leadership and meaningful progress towards a more sustainable snacking business. Highlights include continued advancement in more sustainable sourcing, carbon emission reductions, recyclable packaging, and mindful portions. Demonstrates how Sustainability can help drive resilience, innovation, and long-term business growth. CHICAGO, April 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mondelēz International, Inc.
